amendment.description: An amendment numbered 11 printed in Part C of House Report 113-1 to prohibit the Secretaries of the Interior or Agriculture from acquiring any more federal land using funds provided under this emergency supplemental appropriations bill for Hurricane Sandy relief.

action.text: Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Bishop (UT) to the Frelinghuysen amendment (A003).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bishop (UT) amendment (A013) Agreed to by recorded vote: 223 - 198 (Roll no. 21).
